data.title: 1950s top films & TV series
data.text:
Top films and TV series from the 1950s

Top films of the 1950s (unadjusted domestic gross totals):

The Ten Commandants (1956)

Lady and the Tramp (1955) [animation]

Peter Pan (1953) [animation]

Cinderella (1950) [animation]

Ben Hur (1959)

Sleeping Beauty (1959) [animation]

The Bridge on the River Kwai (1957)

Around the World in 80 Days (1956)

This is Cinerama (1952)

The Greatest Show on Earth ((1952)

Rear Window (1954) [tie]

South Pacific (1958) [tie]

The Robe (1953)

Giant (1956)

Seven Wonders of the World (1956) [Cinerama feature]

From Here to Eternity (1953)

White Christmas (1954)

20,000 Leagues Under the Sea (1954)

Sayonara (1957)

Cinerama Holiday (1955)

** Tim Dirks (2021). Box Office Hits of Decade and Year. All-time box office hits (domestic gross) by decade and year. Filmsite. https://www.filmsite.org/boxoffice2.html

The best TV shows of the 1950s: (sorted by popularity)

Perry Mason (1957-1966)

Gunsmoke (1955-1975)

Leave it to Beaver (1957-1963)

I Love Lucy (1951-1957)

Maverick (1957-1962)

Father Knows Best (1954-1960)

The Lone Ranger (1949-1957)

Adventures of Superman (1952-1958)

The Honeymooners (1955-1956)

Lassie (1954-1973)

Cheyenne (1955-1963)

The Donna Reed Show (1958-1966)

The Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet (1952–1966)

The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp (1955-1961)

Make Room for Daddy (1953-1964)

The George Burns and Gracie Allen Show (1950-1958)

The Amos n’ Andy Show (1951-1953)

Our Miss Brooks (1952-1956)

The Roy Rogers Show (1951-1957)

Puppet Playhouse (1947-1960)

* IMDb TV Database. The Best TV Shows of the 1950s. https://www.imdb.com/list/ls064318746/
